title: Is philosophy contradictory towards science? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, philosophy highlights that Science cannot prove anything because of the Problem of Induction. Read Belief, Proof and ScienceScience. What really peeves many fundamentalists I'd that Science works despite not espousing their “absolute truths”. You try build a working helicopter or the next generation antibacterial treatment based solely on received wisdom and sacred texts. Good luck to you!
Philosophy is not a single way of thinking. Any person’s philosophy can be consistent or contradictory with anything.
